text: Vanilla and caramel are a flavour combination like no other. Each NESTLÉ® DRUMSTICK® Minis Vanilla Caramel Cone (6 x 66ml) twists rich caramel ripple with a delicious vanilla frozen dessert for a duet of savoury flavours, topped by crunchy peanuts in a miniature cone. Plus, it's all crafted in Canada with dairy from Canadian cows, without any artificial colours.
NESTLÉ® DRUMSTICK® Minis Vanilla Caramel Cones (6 x 66 ml) are miniature frozen dessert cones filled with vanilla frozen dessert, a caramel ripple, and topped with chopped peanuts
Crafted right here in Canada with dairy from Canadian cows
